entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
